channel.title: Beginner Server Creation Helper
channel.description:
I made this quickly in about 30 minutes. I think it should help people make their Server by showing them where to go for things like IP, Sources, Editing, Etc.
It's a Batch File, the coding will be placed below the download so you can look at it. only providing download because there are people that don't know how to make Batch Files.
idk if this is allowed? If not remove it :)
Download: http://www.multiupload.com/W05FL16AHB
Coding: [code] @echo off
:main menu cls title RSPS Creator color 0a echo. echo. echo Welcome to the RSPS Creator, this Program will guide you through the process echo of Creating a RuneScape Private Server. Just read and do what it says. echo. echo .:: Important ::. echo To Move on to the Next Step you must press Enter when it's Paused. pause>nul goto step 1
:step 1 cls title Step 1 color 0a echo. echo. echo Step 1 is to Download WinRar. echo. echo WinRar is a program used to Extract Compressed Files so you can use them. pause>nul cls echo. echo. echo Please Enter your System Type - - - - - - - - 32 or 64 echo if your not sure your probably 32 Bit. echo. set /p 1=System Type: if %1%=32 goto winrar32 if %1%=64 goto winrar 64 if %1%=* goto winrarerror
:winrar32 cls title 32 Bit Download color 0e echo. echo Downloading WinRar 32 Bit. start http://www.rarlab.com/rar/wrar391.exe goto Step 2
:winrar64 cls title 64 Bit Download color 0e echo. echo Downloading WinRar 64 Bit. start http://www.rarlab.com/rar/winrar-x64-391.exe goto step 2
:winrarerror cls title Error color 4c echo. echo. echo You Entered an Invalid Type. echo. echo Please Type 32 or 64 pause>nul goto step 1
:step 2 cls title Step 2 echo. echo. echo Step 2 is to Install JDK. echo. echo JDK is used for Compiling the Server. pause>nul cls start http://cds.sun.com/is-bin/INTERSHOP.enfinity/WFS/CDS-CDS_Developer-Site/en_US/-/USD/VerifyItem-Start/jdk-6u17-windows-i586.exe?BundledLineItemUUID=GYFIBe.o4wYAAAEmORwTRBG5&OrderID=_YhIBe.oL.4AAAEmLBwTRBG5&ProductID=I1lIBe.oEPQAAAEkCehn5G0y&FileName=/jdk-6u17-windows-i586.exe goto step 3
:step 3 cls title Step 3 echo. echo. echo Step 3 is to Install JRE echo. echo JRE is for Playing and Running Servers. pause>nul cls start http://cds.sun.com/is-bin/INTERSHOP.enfinity/WFS/CDS-CDS_Developer-Site/en_US/-/USD/VerifyItem-Start/jre-6u17-windows-i586.exe?BundledLineItemUUID=SoJIBe.o1ZYAAAEmQvITRBG6&OrderID=kzdIBe.ox8EAAAEmLfITRBG6&ProductID=AnJIBe.nksgAAAEk.dlUGm0.&FileName=/jre-6u17-windows-i586.exe goto step 4
:step 4 cls title Step 4 echo. echo. echo Step 4 is getting an IP echo. echo An IP is used to login to your Server. pause>nul echo This Site provides Free IP's Just fill this out. . . pause>nul start http://www.no-ip.com/newUser.php goto step 5
:step 5 cls title Step 5 echo. echo. echo Once Registered you must Create an IP. echo. echo Fill out the "Hosname" Box with what you want as your IP and click "Create Host" start https://www.no-ip.com/members/dns/host.php pause>nul goto step 6
:step 6 cls title Step 6 echo. echo. echo Step 6 is Downloading the IP Application. echo. echo Just follow the Instructions shown on the next page. pause>nul start http://www.no-ip.com/downloads.php goto step 7
:step 7 cls title Step 7 echo. echo. echo Step 7 is Downloading a Soruce, this is your Server. echo. echo Browse the Topics on the Next Site and look for one that you like. echo REMEMBER, you need a Server, NOT A CLIENT pause>nul start http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,49.0.html goto step 8
:step 8 cls title Step 8 echo. echo. echo Once you Downloaded your Server Extract it using WinRar. echo to Extract: Right Click the File you Download and hit Extract Here. pause>nul cls echo. echo. echo You will get a Folder, the folder is the files for your Server. echo all left is to Edit the Files for your server. pause>nul goto step 9
:step 9 cls title Step 9 color 0e echo. echo. echo When Editing Remember you only edit .JAVA files, not .CLASS echo Client.java is where most of the Coding is. Menus, Commands, Messages, Etc. echo Just Open Client.JAVA and press control + F and type the name of the source echo then change the name to your Servers Name. echo. echo Once you finish with your changes save the file and look for compiler.bat echo run that batch file and if no errors are there your ready to host! echo if theres errors you have to look at your coding. pause>nul goto step 10
:step 10 cls title Step 10 echo. echo. echo To Turn your Server on just look for a Batch File [.bat] named Run or Start usually. echo Example, Run.bat Start.bat Runserver.bat server.bar pause>nul echo Once you run it a Black window will open, this is the Console. echo. echo Don't Exit the Console it will tell you everything people do, and if it closes the server goes off. :step 11 cls title Step 11 echo. echo. echo PortForwarding is unavailable. Sorry [/code]

item.title: Beginner Server Creation Helper
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

Sorry to burst your bubble, but:

Section Rules:

6) No *.bat / list files PERIOD! There are stupid and a waste of time to bother with. Learn to program with a real language. If you’re beatiful server includes one of these in the topic itself (if its included in the download its okay) then it’ll be locked and you’ll be punished. Forgot to mention, they only work on Windows, too. Also lists aren’t really a download as it is usually a text file with some scribbles in it. The official Moparscape client already has a list. USE IT!

Read full topic

item.title: Beginner Server Creation Helper
item.dc:creator: @stewie0888 stewie0888
item.description:
@stewie0888 wrote:

I made this quickly in about 30 minutes. I think it should help people make their Server by showing them where to go for things like IP, Sources, Editing, Etc.

It’s a Batch File, the coding will be placed below the download so you can look at it. only providing download because there are people that don’t know how to make Batch Files.

idk if this is allowed? If not remove it

Download: http://www.multiupload.com/W05FL16AHB

Coding:

@echo off

:main menu
cls
title RSPS Creator
color 0a
echo.
echo.
echo Welcome to the RSPS Creator, this Program will guide you through the process
echo of Creating a RuneScape Private Server. Just read and do what it says.
echo.
echo .:: Important ::.
echo To Move on to the Next Step you must press Enter when it's Paused.
pause>nul
goto step 1

:step 1
cls
title Step 1
color 0a
echo.
echo.
echo Step 1 is to Download WinRar.
echo.
echo WinRar is a program used to Extract Compressed Files so you can use them.
pause>nul
cls
echo.
echo.
echo Please Enter your System Type - - - - - - - - 32 or 64
echo if your not sure your probably 32 Bit.
echo.
set /p 1=System Type: 
if %1%=32 goto winrar32
if %1%=64 goto winrar 64
if %1%=* goto winrarerror

:winrar32
cls
title 32 Bit Download
color 0e
echo.
echo Downloading WinRar 32 Bit.
start http://www.rarlab.com/rar/wrar391.exe
goto Step 2

:winrar64
cls
title 64 Bit Download
color 0e
echo.
echo Downloading WinRar 64 Bit.
start http://www.rarlab.com/rar/winrar-x64-391.exe
goto step 2

:winrarerror
cls
title Error
color 4c
echo.
echo.
echo You Entered an Invalid Type.
echo.
echo Please Type 32 or 64
pause>nul
goto step 1

:step 2
cls
title Step 2
echo.
echo.
echo Step 2 is to Install JDK.
echo.
echo JDK is used for Compiling the Server.
pause>nul
cls
start http://cds.sun.com/is-bin/INTERSHOP.enfinity/WFS/CDS-CDS_Developer-Site/en_US/-/USD/VerifyItem-Start/jdk-6u17-windows-i586.exe?BundledLineItemUUID=GYFIBe.o4wYAAAEmORwTRBG5&OrderID=_YhIBe.oL.4AAAEmLBwTRBG5&ProductID=I1lIBe.oEPQAAAEkCehn5G0y&FileName=/jdk-6u17-windows-i586.exe
goto step 3

:step 3
cls
title Step 3
echo.
echo.
echo Step 3 is to Install JRE
echo.
echo JRE is for Playing and Running Servers.
pause>nul
cls
start http://cds.sun.com/is-bin/INTERSHOP.enfinity/WFS/CDS-CDS_Developer-Site/en_US/-/USD/VerifyItem-Start/jre-6u17-windows-i586.exe?BundledLineItemUUID=SoJIBe.o1ZYAAAEmQvITRBG6&OrderID=kzdIBe.ox8EAAAEmLfITRBG6&ProductID=AnJIBe.nksgAAAEk.dlUGm0.&FileName=/jre-6u17-windows-i586.exe
goto step 4

:step 4
cls
title Step 4
echo.
echo.
echo Step 4 is getting an IP
echo.
echo An IP is used to login to your Server.
pause>nul
echo This Site provides Free IP's Just fill this out. . .
pause>nul
start http://www.no-ip.com/newUser.php
goto step 5

:step 5
cls
title Step 5
echo.
echo.
echo Once Registered you must Create an IP.
echo.
echo Fill out the "Hosname" Box with what you want as your IP and click "Create Host"
start https://www.no-ip.com/members/dns/host.php
pause>nul
goto step 6

:step 6
cls
title Step 6
echo.
echo.
echo Step 6 is Downloading the IP Application.
echo.
echo Just follow the Instructions shown on the next page.
pause>nul
start http://www.no-ip.com/downloads.php
goto step 7

:step 7
cls
title Step 7
echo.
echo.
echo Step 7 is Downloading a Soruce, this is your Server.
echo.
echo Browse the Topics on the Next Site and look for one that you like.
echo REMEMBER, you need a Server, NOT A CLIENT
pause>nul
start http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,49.0.html
goto step 8

:step 8
cls
title Step 8
echo.
echo.
echo Once you Downloaded your Server Extract it using WinRar.
echo to Extract: Right Click the File you Download and hit Extract Here.
pause>nul
cls
echo.
echo.
echo You will get a Folder, the folder is the files for your Server.
echo all left is to Edit the Files for your server.
pause>nul
goto step 9

:step 9
cls
title Step 9
color 0e
echo.
echo.
echo When Editing Remember you only edit .JAVA files, not .CLASS
echo Client.java is where most of the Coding is. Menus, Commands, Messages, Etc.
echo Just Open Client.JAVA and press control + F and type the name of the source
echo then change the name to your Servers Name.
echo.
echo Once you finish with your changes save the file and look for compiler.bat
echo run that batch file and if no errors are there your ready to host!
echo if theres errors you have to look at your coding.
pause>nul
goto step 10

:step 10
cls
title Step 10
echo.
echo.
echo To Turn your Server on just look for a Batch File [.bat] named Run or Start usually.
echo Example, Run.bat    Start.bat     Runserver.bat    server.bar
pause>nul
echo Once you run it a Black window will open, this is the Console.
echo.
echo Don't Exit the Console it will tell you everything people do, and if it closes the server goes off.
:step 11
cls
title Step 11
echo.
echo.
echo PortForwarding is unavailable. Sorry

Read full topic
